title: 2 Bed 1 Bath Ready To Lease TODAY!!!
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 820 Sq.
Summerwood Apartment Homes offers spacious one and two bedroom floor plans.
Located minutes from the Downtown Hayward BART Station, Summerwood is also convenient to Bay Area businesses, restaurants and freeways.
Enjoy a beautiful playground area, large swimming pool and fitness center.
We are a pet friendly community, welcoming cats and dogs.
Come visit us and make Summerwood your new home.
Prices are subject to change based on availability and qualification of applicant, additional fees may apply, OAC.
Pricing only available on specifically advertising unit and subject to the applicant’s qualification and OAC.

Dishwasher, Controlled Access, Air Conditioning, Patio, Carpet, Additional Storage Unit Included with Select Floorplans, Disposal, Refrigerator, Cable/Satellite Ready, Ceiling Fans, Balcony, Large Closets, Individual Climate Control, Wheelchair Access

Public Transportation and Access to I15 and I215, Covered Parking, State of the Art Fitness Center, Kids Activity Center, Onsite Maintenance, Laundry Facility, Pets Allowed, Carport, Onsite Management, Gated Access, Swimming Pool, Carpeting, Night Patrol
Pet Policy: Maximum Pets per Apartment: 2
•	Dogs - restricted dog breeds are as follows:

•	Doberman, Chow-Chow, Siberian Husky, Saint Bernard, Shar Pei, German Shepherd, Doberman Pinscher, Alaskan Malamute, Akita, Rottweiler, Pit Bull (also known as American Staffordshire, American Pit Bull Terrier, Staffordshire Bull Terrier) and all mixes of all the above breeds
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033
